cpt_tools¶

Work with cpt files in Python

exception pysar.plot.cm.cpt_tools.cptError[source]¶
pysar.plot.cm.cpt_tools.cpt2python(cptfile)[source]¶

Convert GMT-stype CPT file to python colormap. This routine is modified from a routine contained in the scipy cookbook.

pysar.plot.cm.cpt_tools.get_cmap(name, lut=None)[source]¶
pysar.plot.cm.cpt_tools.cpt2cmap(filename, cmapname='colormap', lut=None, inverse=False)[source]¶
